reviews.comments: El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. La decoración de buen gusto y cálida. La ubicación es inmejorable, con restaurants, cervecerías y cafés en toda la zona que -además- es muy segura.Hay un supermercado chino en la cuadra y un negocio tipo despensa abierto hasta re tarde. Super tranquilo para dormir. Además Eugenia en el departamento había cosas básicas como jabón, champú y papel higiénico y sal y aceite. Muy recomendable.
Excelente el departamento, la decoración y el barrio. Eugenia muy atenta y respondiendo a todo rapidamente. 100% recomendable!
Lindo departamento! Para unos días es muy bueno!

El departamento de Eugenia es hermoso. Muy bien ubicado tanto del transporte público como de los bares más lindos de la zona.  Definitivamente volvería a quedarme allí.  Sus respuestas siempre fueron correctas y rápidas. Super recomendable
Muy cálida, amable y atenta. Hermoso departamento. Recomendable.
Muy lindo el depto y muy buena ubicación. Volvería sin dudas.
Excelente!
Eugenia es una persona muy amable y simpatica. El depto es pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario para una comoda estadia.
Todo fue perfecto, el lugar increible y Euge atenta a todas las necesidades. 110% Recomendable!
Eugenia es la mejor anfitriona que he tenido en Airbnb. Súper amable y siempre disponible a ayudar. El departamento es divino, muy limpio y súper bien educado. Muy recomendado!

Eugenia fue muy hospitalaria y cálida a mi llegada, facilitándome todo lo q creía conveniente para una estadía fantástica! 
El departamento es súper cómodo, tranquilo y seguro, queda en una zona ideal para caminar, conocer y trasladarse a varios lugares. 
Espero volver pronto!!!! 
Gracias Eugenia!!!
Muy buen apartamento, es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, moderno, limpio y muy acogedor, lo recomiendo al 100%! y Eugenia muy amable! Excelente volveria!

Hermoso departamento en una ubicación inmejorable.
Ingrid fue muy amigable y hospitalaria. Sin duda volveré. Muy recomendable
Depto muy lindo y cuidado! Excelente la posición.
Hermoso departamento! Con todas las comodidades, excelentemente ubicado, gran decoración y una muy amable y dedicada atención de Eugenia. Sin dudas 100 % recomendable
El apto es muy lindo y esta muy bien ubicado la zona es muy segura. es fácil llegar al metro. Tiene varios restaurantes al rededor y un centro comercial cerca

Estuvimos alojados con mi mujer varios días en el piso.
El piso esta decorado con mucho gusto, la cama confortable.
Al baño no le falta de nada, y ningún problema con el agua caliente.
El depa tiene aire acondicionado, que se agradece en verano.
Eugenia es muy atenta y nos ayudo en todo lo que le pedimos,y contesta muy rápido. Tiene una ficha con recomendaciones propias que son muy buenas.

La ubicación del depa es perfecta, en pleno Palermo, con un montón de bares, restaurantes, tiendas...esta perfecto. Además hay una parada de metro no muy lejos.
Un depa muy recomendable para Buenos Aires!!!!!
Gracias Eugenia,hemos pasado una estancia muy buena.

Estuvimos alojados varios días en el piso de Eugenia, y todo fue perfecto. El piso está muy lindo, decorado con gusto. La cama es cómoda, tiene pequeña cocina. El baño está bien también, con agua caliente. El piso tiene también aire acondicionado y balcón!
Eugenia es muy atenta, y nos ayudó en todo, contestando a los mensajes muy rápidamente. 
La ubicación del piso perfecta, el barrio es muy bonito con muchos árboles, estás al lado de bares, restaurantes con mucho ambiente, pero donde está el piso está tranquilo. De las mejores zonas de Buenos aires! Hay metro cerca también. Eugenia deja recomendaciones en el piso para comer, cenar, shopping...un piso 100% recomendable!

El departamento de Eugenia es tal cual aparece en las fotografías. 
Es un lugar cómodo, solo que las duchas deben ser cortas ya que el estanque de agua es muy pequeño.

Departamento muy comodo, lindo y bien ubicado, con todas las cosas para cuvrir las necesidades basicas.

La ubicacion es excelente! Seguro volveremos.
El departamento muy cómodo y acogedor. El barrio tranquilo, seguro y entretenido. Eugenia tiene muy buena voluntad.
Excelente anfitriona
Excelente anfitriona, el lugar es excelente, cómodo y muy bien ubicado.
Eugenia es una excelente host y el departamento tiene un ubicación increíble en medio de Palermo. Hay restaurantes increíbles cerca y se puede caminar a todos lados. Recomendado!

Nos encanto quedarnos en el departamento de Eugenia, ella es una persona muy atenta y la ubicación es perfecta. 

¡El departamento es igual a las fotos!
Todo perfecto. Nada que objetar.
Muy Buena locaclizacion

El lugar es bellísimo! al llegar Eugenia nos recibió muy amablemente y nos explico todos los detalles del lugar, incluso nos facilito una bañerita para nuestro bebe y una mini estufa para la salida del baño.

Fuimos con mi novia por el fin de semana y pasamos re bien. El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, muy bien decorado y todo se encontraba en perfecto estado y muy limpio. Eugenia nos recibió muy amablemente y se puso a las ordenes por cualquier cosa. La zona es la mejor de buenos aires siempre que te guste salir a comer, tomar algo y hacer algunas compras .
The perfect location to discover the city! Super luminous apartment, comfortable and ideal for a couple of days in Buenos Aires. Thanks Eugenia!

The apartment was very cleaned and well looked after. I found it very comfortable with all the facilities expected. Closed to public transport to the centre of the city and lots of restaurants in the area. I had a great time in the apartment and Eugenia was very helpful and easy to deal with.
I recommend staying here. Great location and Eugenia was super flexible regarding check in and check out time. If you have a lot of luggage you will have to work around to make space for it.

Très chouette appartement dans un quartier où il fait bon vivre à Buenos Aires. Eugenia a été une hôte très agréable avec qui la communication a été facile. Je recommande vivement de venir passer un séjour chez elle.

We booked this apartment for three nights, however, we were only able to stay for one night due to flight issues. Eugenia's apartment is clean, sunny, and well-appointed and perfect for two people. It's well-priced and in a good location, walkable to lots of restaurants in Palermo. Eugenia was easy to get in touch with and quick to respond to my multiple messages informing her about our travel issues. The only trouble we had was with the key to the apartment door; the keys are different from what we are used to in the USA so make sure you ask for a demonstration for how to lock/unlock the door. We highly recommend this apartment and wish we could have stayed longer!
Lovely apartment in the heart of it all. Host was accommodating of our delayed arrival and being able to store our bags the day we left was so great. What a perfect start to our Argentine adventure

We had a great stay at Eugenia's place in Buenos Aires.  The apartment was very comfortable, homie, and secure.  Great location.  Eugenia was extremely helpful and responsive.  Check-in was easy as well.

Great studio.  Clean, well appointed and airy.  Faces the back of the building which is great, as I like the quiet and have had problems with noisy street facing places.  Has a cheerful balcony full of plants which is also nice.

This apartment was perfect for my girlfriend and I touring Buenos Aires! It was right next to Palermo, which was the district we most frequently visited. The apartment itself had was quite beautiful and Eugenia was a wonderful host. For a studio, you really can't beat this location.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Really great and flexible host that communicates quickly! Definitely recommend.
Beautiful studio very clean and confortable , Eugenia very kind, the position Palermo is for people who doesn’t care about noise and  Music and want to leave the night

Lovely flat in a great location! A short walk to the station which made getting around BA very easy. Our favourite aspect of the flat was probably the area of Palermo itself - lively but laid back with great restaurants and bars, try Eugenia's suggestions and you won't go wrong! What's more, our host was very responsive and provided new towels mid-way through our stay. Highly recommended.
Lovely apartment in a great area to explore BA, highly recommend

My husband and I spent 4 nights in Liliana's lovely apartment in Palermo.  It was the perfect base for our visit to Buenos Aires - clean, comfortable, secure and very well located in a safe neighbourhood, close to a wide variety of restaurants and bars and with a couple of small supermarkets and a greengrocer also nearby. Eugenia was a perfect host and responded quickly and helpfully to all questions raised.

Eugenia's flat has everything you might need, is spotless and is decorated really nicely. It's close to lots of great restaurants and bars and the whole area has a lovely atmosphere. 

Eugenia was very kind and arranged for someone to meet us for a late check in. She responded quickly to all of my questions and left lots of useful information for us at the flat. 

The area is noisier on Friday and Saturday nights so you may want to use ear plugs if you are a light sleeper like me. Otherwise, everything about Eugenia's place is very convenient and I'd definitely recommend it.

Vielen Dank für den kurzen aber angenehmen Aufenthalt. Wir können diese Wohnung sehr empfehlen, die Lage ist super. Auch für die Unterstützung bei dem Kauf der Tickets für die Toten Hosen - THANK YOU!!!
Prima studio in een van de leukste wijken van Buenos Aires.
Excellent apartment right in the middle of Palermo surrounded by restaurants, bakeries and excellent traffic connections! Highly recommended!
Local bem organizado, pequeno mas limpo é em ótima localização !

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, com bastante luz natural e um ótimo tamanho. O sofá e a mesinha de centro auxiliam muito para um segundo ambiente.
A cozinha é toda equipada, e há 2 mercadinhos praticamente na porta do prédio, e um supermerdado Dia a 1 ou 2 quadras.
A cama é confortável, o aquecedor não é tão potente, mas há cobertores que dão conta do frio a noite (pegamos 8º graus).
O nosso único problema foi o chuveiro que era quente apenas por 10/15 minutos, e depois tinhamos que esperar entre 40/50 minutos para uma segunda pessoa tomar banho, e ter água quente novamente por 10/15 minutos também!
Mesmo assim o tempo do banho não nos atrapalhou, e a estádia foi excelente!
Há uma estação de metro a menos de 10 minutos caminhando do apartamento, VÁRIOS restaurantes a sua volta e táxis na rua de dia e a noite!
(PS: Há um espelho enorme no quarto, e não apenas o do banheiro!)

A perfect place for my first trip to Buenos Aires. It was close to my office and in the hip Palermo Hollywood neighborhood steps to great restaurants and bars. The apartment is well appointed and comfortable. Will stay here again on my next work trip!
Eugenia was extremely helpful and helped make my stay in Buenos Aires a great experience.  Her flat is ideally situated to explore the city, extremely clean, bright, and airy.

This apartment is perfect! It's very modern, comfortable and has a wonderful view from the balcony. 

She is quick to respond to texts/questions and even allowed me to drop my bags off before official check in. 

She is a wonderful host. 5/5

Eugenia's apartment is a delight! Small, but extremely cozy, it is thoughtfully decorated and perfectly equipped for short term vacations. The building is brand new and the location is absolutely perfect. There's plenty to do around, lots of bars and restaurants, and it's a few minutes walk from lovely Plaza Serrano. Eugenia was a peach, and communication was easy and fast. I would definitely recommend staying there, in fact I can wait to get back!

Passamos dias maravilhosos no apartamento da Eugenia. Ele é exatamente como nas fotos, nos sentimos em casa. A localização é maravilhosa, difícil escolher apenas um lugar para sair à noite. Encontramos tudo que precisamos no apartamento. Próximo ao metro de Palermo e um bairro movimentado e seguro para os passeios (URL HIDDEN) certeza voltaremos!

Nice apartment in a great location. Many restaurants and things to see and do around this area. 
Close to many parks as well and easy acces to big streets.
Apartment well kept and great view.
Great location. Eugenia was really helpful and responsive. Would stay again.

Eugenia, was easy to communicate with and was very lovely. She was flexiable and allowed us early access to apartment. We were so  grateful. The apartment is clean and charming in its decor and has an amazing location. Her television was set up with Amazon fire stick which was awesome! However I must be honest,  I found the bed to be entirely uncomfortable due to it being lumpy and hard and soft in spots. My son resorted to sleeping on the couch while I tried to find a spot in the bed that was even in its consistency. Towels were so rough but aside from that ok!

OMG! What can I say? The apartment is LOVELY. Whether you're alone or a couple, you'll love your stay here. In the heart of Palermo, close to nightlife and close to Av. Santa Fe where you have subway and tons of buses. The studio is small but very well curated and maintained. Eugenia was super responsive, quick and helpful. Good check-in/check-out experience. I'm Argentine so I didn't need any city tip. RECOMMENDED TOTES.

I absolutely loved staying in this apartment, it was my second Airbnb in Buenos Aires (both in Palermo) and this location is as good as it gets! The apartment is beautiful, the bed is really comfortable and the restaurants surrounding are perfect. I'm not sure what more you could want! 
For tourists: be sure to visit POP Sushi, La Pescadorita, Morelia (and for UK guests, there is an excellent chippy a few blocks away). Thanks again Eugenia! :)
Great bang for the buck! Clean, secure, robust Internet access (wifi) in Palermo. Eugenia is awesome...
Great place, but definitely needed more than two days to explore the immediate area never mind Buenos Aires.
Eugenia was over the top helpful and this apartment is in the perfect part of town if you're into great cafes, restaurants and nightlife.

Eugenia was incredibly helpful and responsive.  She let me arrive early and accommodated my travels schedule which I so appreciate.   The apartment is absolutely lovely. It was the perfect place to stay, very stylish, clean, and an incredible location. Highly recommend and would certainly return.
This is a great flat in Palermo, really cute and well located. Eugenia was an incredibly helpful host too. Would highly recommend.
Loved staying in the trendy Palermo neighborhood.  Eugenia was a great host and very accomodating!
Fantastic flat for a stay in Buenos Aires! Great location and super clean and well designed space. And fabulous value! Was absolutely perfect for my trip to BA!
It's all about the location. So many great places nearby. Incredibly easy stay and a lovely apartment

Felt like home, perfect for 2 guests. Didn't get to meet Eugenia personally; she arranged for her friend in the building to check us in. Neighborhood is safe and wonderful for walking around; lively at night for going out. Close to a convenient store, banks, lots of restaurants, metro. Would definitely stay here again.

Wow just wow...the place was great infact amazing
..not only would we stay again infact we didnt want to leave.

1. We arrived super early Eugenia took our rucksacks super early literally 4mins after we arrived, she gave us a key so we could come back when flat was clean. +

2. Little details like towels. Bed linen netflicks inbed! V nice. Design of flat. Art on walls wi fi

3. Neighbourhood is superhip, trendy and safe which is great after staying in some other parts of B.a

4. Kitchen and fridge were great and useful we warmed up empanadas and dressed salad we bought outside.

5. Shower was warm! Bathroom very nice.

6. Eugenia was great.
  
7. Did i mention watching netflix in a great comfy bed??? ++

8. Within 15/20 min walk of Japanese Gardens. Something we wanted to see

9. PALERMO super nice barrio

10. Stay here! You wont regret it.
Great place. Good value, excellent location.
Everything was Great! Top Location!
We loved our stay in this flat. It was very comfortable and in a perfect location in palermo Hollywood. Lovely area with nice cafes and restaurants nearby. Would definitely reccomend !
Het is alles dat je nodig hebt. Het appartement ligt in een hele fijne wijk waar van alles te beleven is. Het is schoon, simpel maar comfortabel. De gastvrouw is erg aardig en behulpzaam.
Great place in an awesome neighborhood.  Eugenia's apartment was spotless and looked exactly like the photos shown.  She was available and helpful. Highly recommend!

My partner and I stayed at Eugenia's apartment for 3 nights and had a wonderful experience. 

We had an easy time communicating, and met us promptly on our arrival to let us in.

The apartment itself was clean, and cutely decorated. The neighbourhood has a lot of nice resetaurants nearby, and is conveniently located near a subway stop.

Eugenia was nice in accommodating our early morning departure. We had a lovely time and highly recommend staying in Buenos Aires with her!

Phil & Katie
Fantastic apartment in an excellent location. Eugenia is a great host, check in was easy and she was available to answer questions. Highly recommended.
Eugenia was very helpful during check in and check out. Her apartment is cozy and comfortable and very centrally located. We would definitely stay here again.

I would definitely recommend this place! The apartmend is very cosy and modern furnitured, the neighbourhood Palermo is just fantastic with lots of unique restaurants, cafes and little shops.
Eugenia is a great person and host. She always responded very quickly and helped me with everything. I had a perfect stay!
Fabulous little apartment in a great location in Palermo. Can't fault it.
Eugenia's apartment is perfect. Spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated, it felt like a home away from home. Eugenia was always available and quick to answer any messages. We loved our stay here!
Great location and wonderful apartment.  Eugenia was very kind and helpful.

We stayed in a really nice appartment, looks exactly as on the pictures. Eugenia waited for us in front of the building and gave us a good start of our stay in BA.
Lots of restaurants and bars nearby and the subway is just 10 minutes walk from the appartment.
Can be a bit noisy in the evening because of the many young people that live in the building.
Eugenia is very nice and welcoming, the communication was great. And her love for decoration makes the apartment a beautiful, cozy hideaway with a nice view.

If you are looking for a cozy, central and stylish accomodation in Buenos Aires, Eugenias apartment is the place to be! You can enjoy a coffee in the morning sun on the balcony, the kitchen is well equipped and the bathroom is nice and clean. Eugenia was great at communicating. We definitely recommend Eugenia and her apartment!

Eugenia's studio in Palermo is in a wonderful location and was an excellent base for our exploration of Buenos Aires. It's a great size and space for one or two people and was extremely comfortable. All our interactions with Eugenia were super easy and smooth. We loved our stay!

Eugenia's flat is the petted base for a stay in Buenos Aires. Well located, it's among the cafes and restaurants of beautiful Palermo - one of BA's best areas. The Palermo subway station is a 5 min walk away (and very inexpensive to use). The flat has everything you could need for a stay and Eugenia is a great host - very friendly and happy to answer any questions during my stay. If I come back to BA anytime soon I would definitely hope to stay here again - I highly recommend it!

Un emplacement trés bien situé, quartier calme et aussi très animé
c'est vraiment une bonne adresse pour séjourner et pour profiter de Buenos Aires. Nous y avons passé 15 jours avec plaisir. 
Eugénia a tout fait pour rendre le séjour agréable et nous aider
Lugar perfeito,  muitos restaurantes bons ao redor, seguro,  próximo ao metrô e a um outlet bom.  Pode reservar sem medo.

Pernoitei por 10 noites no apartamento da Eugenia. Foi a melhor experiência de viagem que tive. A descrição do apartamento nas fotos são iguais ao real. Perto de metrô, lojas, restaurantes. Bem localizado, sem falar que a recepção é bem familiar, transmitindo conforto, credibilidade. Nada me faltaste, por tanto agradeço a recepção e logo retornarei a Buenos Aires para mais uma férias. Amei!
Eugenia é um amor, o apartamento é uma graça!
fantastic

My husband and I had a great time in Buenos Aires and staying at Eugenia's Palermo apartment was perfect. The space was clean, comfortable and in a great location. Eugenia was awesome and very accommodating (we were delayed arriving to the apartment and she was there waiting for us, and we extended by 1 night with no trouble).

Eugenia was an amazing host, she was very accommodating helping me in and out of the apartments I stayed in.  The pictures couldn't be more accurate to the genuine look of the apartment.  It was very clean and comfortable, I would recommend this apartment to anyone. Location is pretty much perfect as well.
The apartment is nice, clean and pratical with a good location. Eugenia is a wonderful host always disponible and helping. We had a great week !

Unfortunately we did not get to meet Eugenia due to our flight times, but nevertheless Eugenia was happy to help via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) - she always answered any questions we had promptly and thoroughly. The apartment was really lovely, although a bit on the cold side at times (I think we were maybe unlucky with some unseasonably cold weather?!) Other than this it was perfectly clean and exactly as on pictures. It was a lovely base to have in a safe neighbourhood. There were plenty of fabulous restaurants and bars right on the door step - yet the apartment wasn't too polluted by street noise. On the whole a really nice stay, thanks Eugenia :)

Eu e meu marido passamos 10 dias em Buenos Aires. O apartamento da Eugenia é muito bacana, bem decorado, equipado e com uma localização ótima. Perto de mercados, restaurantes, estação de metrô. O bairro é super gostoso de passear. Eugenia é muito atenciosa além de ser super querida. Nos auxiliou em tudo que precisamos. Recomendamos e voltaremos com certeza!!

Eugenia is awesome. She did everything to make us feel good and confortable. The appartment is very good, we had a great time here. It is also located in a very good place, near to one of the main avenues in BA and near to many restaurants and pubs. I do recommend this appartment in Palermo.

Great location! Walking distance to bars, cafes and restaurants! Secure apartment, there was a bit of noise at night (which can be expected right in the middle of things) bring some airplugs, if you're super sensitive to sound. All cooking supplies did the trick for us in the week we stayed. 

When needing a cab to get to San Telmo (definately check out the Sunday markets - the leather goods are awesome) or La Boca would suggest ubering, including the airport! Taxi's tend to be double the price or more... Muchos Gracias Eugenia!

Maravilhoso estatia e encantadora Eugênia !!!!
Obrigada espaço limpo perto de ótimos restaurantes e uma anfitriã nota mil !!!! 
Quero retornar!!!!
Apartamento , limpo, decoração clean, localização excelente no meio de Palermo Soho, próximo ao metro , bons restaurantes, parques e praças . Faltou um sistema de aquecimento mais eficiente.
